original_title: Portrait of a Great Lady / Queen Elizabeth: The Queen Mother: 90 Glorious Years
overview: The remarkable life of Britain's long-living royal, the Queen Mother, is lovingly remembered in this documentary double feature. In Portrait of a Great Lady, beloved actor David Niven guides viewers through the Queen Mum's life, which oversaw pivotal moments of the 20th century. The second feature, Queen Elizabeth: The Queen Mother: 90 Glorious Years, is narrated by Richard Baker.
title: Portrait of a Great Lady / Queen Elizabeth: The Queen Mother: 90 Glorious Years
